text: Barry Otto (born 1941) is an Australian actor and voice actor, primarily of cinema. He is also an amateur artist. ==Career== Otto received an AACTA Award for Best Supporting Actor in Strictly Ballroom. Barry Spurr; Lloyd Cameron, Standard English (Glebe, NSW: Pascal Press, 2003), p. 167 He was also nominated for Bliss,Errol Vieth; Albert Moran, Historical Dictionary of Australian and New Zealand Cinema (Lanham, MD: Rowman & Littlefield Publishing Group, 2005), p. 73 Cosi and The More Things Change.... Otto portrayed Administrator Allsop in Australia in 2008. He has appeared in The Dressmaker, Kiss or Kill, Dead Letter Office, The Visitor, The Great Gatsby, Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole, Love's Brother, Blinky Bill. An amateur artist, he often paints members of his family. Otto has twice entered the Archibald Prize. He is the father of actresses Gracie and Miranda Otto. == References == Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian voice actors Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:People from Brisbane Category:Blinky Bill
title: Barry Otto
